descriptions.Hair Cut & Wash: Latest trending hair cutting styles with professional hair wash using quality shampoo for fresh, salon-perfect look.
descriptions.Deep Conditioning: Advanced hair conditioning treatment to repair dry, damaged hair and restore natural shine and softness.
descriptions.Beard Styling: Modern beard trimming, shaping and grooming by expert barbers for smart, dapper gentleman look.
descriptions.Head Massage: Relaxing champi (head massage) with herbal oils for stress relief, better hair growth and cooling effect.
descriptions.Hair Color (or) Hair Spa: Choose trendy hair colour transformation or deep nourishing spa treatment for silky, bouncy hair.
descriptions.Clean-up: Instant glow facial clean-up for fresh, fair and radiant complexion perfect for parties and events.
descriptions.De-tan F&N: Remove sun tan from face and neck for fairer, brighter skin tone and even complexion.
descriptions.Fruit Facial: Natural fruit facial with vitamins for glowing, fair skin and youthful appearance.
descriptions.Pedicure: Professional foot care with scrubbing, massage, nail paint and moisturizing for soft, beautiful feet.
descriptions.Manicure: Complete hand care with nail cutting, filing, cuticle care, massage and nail polish for elegant hands.
descriptions.Foot Massage: Traditional foot massage (paad maalish) for relaxation, pain relief and better blood circulation.
descriptions.Threading: Expert eyebrow threading and upper lip threading for perfect brow shape and smooth, hair-free face.
descriptions.Rica Waxing (Full arm, Underarm & Full l: Premium Rica wax for full arms, underarms and legs - painless, smooth skin for 4-6 weeks.
descriptions.De-tan: Powerful de-tan treatment to remove sun damage, pigmentation and restore fair, even skin tone.
descriptions.Basic Pedicure & Manicure: Regular pedi-mani combo for clean, groomed nails and soft hands and feet.
descriptions.Premium Facial: Luxury salon facial with deep cleansing, brightening, anti-aging for fair, glowing and younger-looking skin.
descriptions.Hair Spa: Complete hair spa treatment with smoothening, conditioning and shine for silky, salon-finish hair.
descriptions.Full Wax: Full body waxing service for completely smooth, hair-free skin lasting weeks - arms, legs, back.
descriptions.Root Touchup: Quick root colour touch-up to cover white/grey hair and maintain your hair colour perfectly.
descriptions.Deep Conditioning (or) Full Wax: Pick deep conditioning for smooth, shiny hair or full body wax for clean, hair-free glowing skin.
descriptions.Hair Spa (or) Root Touchup: Choose nourishing hair spa for damaged hair or root colour service to cover grey hair regrowth.
descriptions.Advanced Whitening Facial: Premium fairness facial with skin brightening actives for fair, radiant and glowing complexion.
descriptions.Premium Pedicure & Manicure: Deluxe pedi-mani package with spa massage, scrub, nail art and premium finish for party-ready look.
